text: The 1980–81 Cornell Big Red men's basketball team represented Cornell University during the 1980–81 college men's basketball season. The team finished with a final record of 7–19, 4—10, and they finished 6th in the Ivy League. This was coach Tom Miller's first season at Cornell. ==Roster== ==Schedule== == References == Cornell Category:Cornell Big Red men's basketball seasons Cornell Cornell
title: 1980–81 Cornell Big Red men's basketball team
